case_name: State v. Dosso
summary: Validated the 1958 martial law under revolutionary legality; later overruled.

case_name: Miss Asma Jilani v. Government of Punjab
summary: Overruled Dosso; declared Yahya Khan a usurper and restored constitutional supremacy.

case_name: Moulvi Tameez-ud-Din Khan v. Federation of Pakistan
summary: Challenged Governor-General’s dissolution; foundational pre-constitution case.

case_name: Begum Nusrat Bhutto v. Chief of the Army Staff
summary: Upheld detention of political leaders post-coup while invoking state necessity.

case_name: Benazir Bhutto v. Federation of Pakistan
summary: Strengthened freedom of association and fair electoral process standards.

case_name: Federation of Pakistan v. Haji Saifullah Khan
summary: Struck down dissolution of National Assembly under Article 58(2)(b) in that instance.

case_name: Al-Jehad Trust v. Federation (Judges’ Case I)
summary: Laid down seniority and consultation principles for judicial appointments.

case_name: Al-Jehad Trust (Judges’ Case II)
summary: Clarified primacy of Chief Justice’s opinion in appointments/transfers.

case_name: Shehla Zia v. WAPDA
summary: Recognized environmental protection as part of the constitutional right to life.

case_name: Hakim Khan v. Government of Pakistan
summary: Reaffirmed Constitution’s supremacy over Islamic injunctions in constitutional questions.

case_name: Sh. Liaqat Hussain v. Federation of Pakistan
summary: Invalidated establishment of military courts for civilians by executive order.

case_name: Syed Zafar Ali Shah v. General Pervez Musharraf
summary: Conditionally validated the 1999 coup; allowed limited constitutional amendments.

case_name: Mehram Ali v. Federation of Pakistan
summary: Upheld Anti-Terrorism Act courts but read in safeguards for fair trial.

case_name: Muhammad Nawaz Sharif v. President of Pakistan
summary: Restored dissolved National Assembly; limited President’s dissolution power in practice.

case_name: Qazi Wali Muhammad v. The State (Safia Bibi context)
summary: Highlighted evidentiary standards and protections for rape victims under Hudood laws.

case_name: Sardar Farooq Ahmad Khan Leghari v. Federation
summary: Clarified limits of executive authority following constitutional amendments.

case_name: Hussain Bakhsh v. Settlement Commissioner
summary: Reinforced standards for reasoned administrative decisions and judicial review.

case_name: Federation v. Malik Ghulam Mustafa Khar
summary: Asserted due process and fair trial guarantees in preventive detention.

case_name: Messrs Elahi Cotton Mills Ltd. v. Federation of Pakistan
summary: Upheld broad fiscal powers while articulating proportionality in taxation.

case_name: Khan Asfandyar Wali v. Federation of Pakistan
summary: Sustained NAB framework with significant safeguards and interpretive limits.

case_name: Sindh High Court Bar Association v. Federation (PCO Judges)
summary: Invalidated Nov. 3, 2007 PCO; restored pre-emergency judiciary.

case_name: Watan Party v. Federation (Pakistan Steel Mills)
summary: Blocked privatization, stressing transparency and public interest.

case_name: Chief Justice Iftikhar Muhammad Chaudhry v. President of Pakistan
summary: Suspension reference quashed; reinforced safeguards for removing judges.

case_name: Dr. Mubashir Hassan v. Federation (NRO case)
summary: Struck down NRO; reopened corruption cases; emphasized equality before law.

case_name: Workers’ Party Pakistan v. Federation
summary: Curbed excessive campaign spending; mandated level playing field.

case_name: Air Marshal (R) Asghar Khan v. General Mirza Aslam Beg
summary: Held distribution of funds to politicians unlawful; demanded accountability.

case_name: Mst. Sughran Bibi v. The State
summary: Clarified that multiple statements may be recorded; one FIR per occurrence refined.

case_name: Asia Bibi v. The State
summary: Acquittal emphasized high evidentiary standards and benefit of doubt.

case_name: Islamic Republic of Pakistan v. Mumtaz Qadri
summary: Upheld conviction; narrowed scope of provocation defenses.

case_name: Suo Motu: Pakistan Railways Case
summary: Directed reforms and accountability for losses/mismanagement in a key SOE.

case_name: Nadeem Ahmed v. Federation (NRO implementation)
summary: Ensured enforcement of the NRO judgment and mutual legal assistance steps.

case_name: District Bar Association Rawalpindi v. Federation (21st Amendment)
summary: Upheld 21st Amendment creating military courts, with strict temporal limits.

case_name: Suo Motu: Privatization Commission (OGDCL/energy)
summary: Reinforced transparency requirements in strategic asset transactions.

case_name: Mazdoor Kisan Party v. Federation
summary: Addressed restrictions on political parties; cemented associational freedoms.

case_name: Shirin Munir v. Government of Punjab
summary: Protected students’ rights and due process in academic expulsions.

case_name: Mehreen Zaibun Nisa v. Land Commissioner
summary: Balanced land reform measures with constitutional protections.

case_name: Usif Patel v. Crown
summary: Set early standards for appellate review in criminal matters.

case_name: Abdul Wali Khan v. Federation
summary: Set limits on preventive detention of political opponents.

case_name: Sharaf Faridi v. Federation
summary: Advanced autonomy and rule-based governance of the legal profession.

case_name: Sindh High Court Bar Association v. Federation (18th Amendment)
summary: Read in safeguards to protect judicial independence under new mechanism.

case_name: Pakistan Muslim League (N) v. Federation (Memogate)
summary: Ordered inquiry commission; delineated judicial oversight in security matters.

case_name: Constitution Petition re: Reko Diq (TCC) — Original lease dispute
summary: Invalidated earlier arrangements; emphasized transparency in mineral concessions.

case_name: Reko Diq Settlement Validation Reference
summary: Approved settlement framework to revive project and mitigate penalty exposure.

case_name: Imran Ahmad Khan Niazi v. Mian Muhammad Nawaz Sharif (Panama Papers)
summary: Disqualified the Prime Minister under Article 62(1)(f) for nondisclosure.

case_name: Hanif Abbasi v. Imran Khan
summary: Clarified standards for honesty and disclosure of assets for candidates.

case_name: Khawaja Muhammad Asif v. Usman Dar
summary: Interpreted employment/Iqama disclosures; restored candidate after disqualification.

case_name: Suo Motu: Faizabad Dharna Case
summary: Set principles on protests, media freedom, and non-interference by security agencies.

case_name: Justice Qazi Faez Isa v. President of Pakistan (Reference Case)
summary: Quashed presidential reference; reinforced safeguards against mala fide actions.

case_name: Justice Qazi Faez Isa Review / Clarification Orders
summary: Set aside directions to tax authorities; protected due process for judges.

case_name: Suo Motu: COVID-19 Management
summary: Outlined coordination and oversight standards during a national health emergency.

case_name: Zia-ur-Rehman v. The State
summary: Distinguished illegality from mere irregularity; clarified when procedural defects vitiate convictions.

case_name: Government of Balochistan v. Azizullah Memon
summary: Struck down Special Courts for Speedy Trials created through executive measures as unconstitutional.

case_name: Zaheeruddin v. The State
summary: Upheld criminal restrictions on Ahmadis using Islamic epithets; debated scope of religious freedom.

case_name: Mst. Khurshid Bibi v. Baboo Muhammad Amin
summary: Recognized khula without husband’s consent upon proof of irretrievable breakdown, shaping Muslim family law.

case_name: Mst. Kaneez Fatima v. Wali Muhammad
summary: Affirmed daughters’ inheritance rights and clarified rules for mutation and limitation in succession disputes.

case_name: Shariat Petition: Riba (Interest) Cases (Consolidated)
court: Shariat Appellate Bench, Supreme Court of Pakistan
summary: Declared interest (riba) repugnant to Islam and directed transformation of financial system; later remanded in 2002 for reconsideration.

case_name: Pakistan Lawyers Forum v. Federation of Pakistan
summary: Examined WTO/TRIPS commitments and separation of powers in implementing international agreements domestically.

case_name: Suo Motu: Pakistan International Airlines (PIA) Privatization/Management
summary: Laid transparency and fiduciary standards for restructuring national carriers and other SOEs.

case_name: Suo Motu Case: Missing Persons (HRC No. 965/2007)
summary: Catalyzed habeas corpus jurisprudence against enforced disappearances and underscored accountability of agencies.

case_name: Javed Hashmi v. The State
summary: Assessed sedition-related convictions; discussed fair trial and political speech considerations.

case_name: Suo Motu: Rental Power Projects (RPP) Case
summary: Held RPP contracts void ab initio for lack of transparency; ordered recovery and accountability measures.

case_name: Mustafa Impex, Karachi v. Government of Pakistan
summary: Held that fiscal/executive decisions vest in the Federal Cabinet, not lone ministers or secretaries.

case_name: Durrani Ceramics and Others v. Federation of Pakistan (GIDC)
summary: Clarified constitutional competence to levy the Gas Infrastructure Development Cess and limits on delegated taxation.

case_name: Suo Motu: Burn Factories (Baldia & others) Industrial Safety
summary: Advanced employer liability and regulatory oversight standards after catastrophic factory fires.

case_name: Pakistan Broadcasters Association v. Pakistan Electronic Media Regulatory Authority (PEMRA)
summary: Read down content restrictions and arbitrary fines; emphasized due process in broadcast regulation.

case_name: Mst. Asia v. Federation (Protection of Women Act challenges)
summary: Addressed constitutionality of Protection of Women (Criminal Laws Amendment) Act provisions vis-à-vis Hudood laws.

case_name: Ashgar Leghari v. Federation of Pakistan
summary: Directed implementation of Pakistan’s climate framework; created Climate Change Commission for oversight.

case_name: Suo Motu: Smog and Air Quality in Punjab
summary: Mandated provincial action plans for smog; recognized clean air as part of the right to life.

case_name: Qamar Zaman v. Government of Pakistan (Phone Tapping)
summary: Held that executive phone tapping without legal authorization violates fundamental rights; required statutory safeguards.

case_name: Pakistan Defence Officers Housing Authority v. Mrs. Saeeda
summary: Strengthened rights of allottees against housing authorities for delays and arbitrary cancellations.

case_name: Darshan Masih (Bonded Labour) v. The State
summary: Converted a letter into a habeas corpus petition to free kiln workers; catalyzed bonded-labour abolition and state duty to protect vulnerable workers.

case_name: State v. Zulfiqar Ali Bhutto
summary: Upheld conviction and death sentence of a former Prime Minister; remains a touchstone for debates on fair trial and judicial independence.

case_name: Salman Akram Raja v. Government of Punjab
summary: Issued binding guidelines for rape investigations, including survivor-sensitive procedures and medico-legal reforms.

case_name: Anita Turab v. Federation of Pakistan
summary: Protected tenure and merit-based postings of civil servants; curtailed arbitrary transfers and political interference.

case_name: Suo Motu: Tariq Aziz-ud-Din Appointments Case
summary: Annulled irregular appointments/promotions; restated merit, transparency, and due process in public service.

case_name: In Re: Contempt Proceedings against Prime Minister Yousaf Raza Gilani
summary: Conviction for contempt led to disqualification of a sitting Prime Minister; clarified scope of judicial commands.

case_name: Humaira Mehmood v. The State
summary: Affirmed a competent adult woman’s right to contract marriage of choice without wali’s consent; protection against custodial detention by family.

case_name: Saima Waheed Khawar v. The State
summary: Held that adult Muslim women may marry of free will; directed police to protect couples from harassment.

case_name: Mst. Mukhtar Mai v. Abdul Khaliq & Others
summary: Addressed gang-rape prosecution standards; sparked reforms discourse on witness protection and investigation quality.

case_name: Muhammad Akram v. The State
summary: Reinforced the ‘benefit of doubt’ standard: a single reasonable doubt entitles the accused to acquittal.

case_name: Human Rights Case: Sindh Water & Sanitation Commission
summary: Constituted and supervised a commission to remedy unsafe drinking water and poor sanitation across Sindh.

case_name: Bahria Town Karachi Implementation Proceedings
summary: Approved a structured settlement with strict compliance to regulate land use and recover public dues.

case_name: Nasla Tower Demolition Case
summary: Ordered demolition of an illegally constructed high-rise and compensation to affected allottees; emphasized rule-based urban planning.

case_name: Special Court (High Treason) v. Pervez Musharraf
court: Special Court under High Treason (Punishment) Act
summary: Convicted a former military ruler under Article 6 for subverting the Constitution; triggered separation-of-powers debates.

case_name: Pervez Musharraf v. Federation (Special Court Formation Challenge)
summary: Held the constitution of the Special Court and certain procedural aspects to be unlawful; affected execution of treason verdict.

case_name: Imrana Tiwana v. Province of Punjab (Orange Line Metro Train)
summary: Allowed a major transit project with stringent safeguards near heritage sites; balanced development with conservation duties.

case_name: Shahida Zahir Abbasi v. Pakistan
summary: Recognized compensation for unlawful detention and custodial excesses; advanced constitutional remedies against the state.

case_name: Pakistan Sugar Mills Association v. Federation (Price Fixation)
summary: Read down arbitrary price fixation; required evidence-based regulation and protection of consumers within lawful bounds.

case_name: Model Town Inquiry Report Case
summary: Directed public disclosure of a judicial inquiry report into the Model Town incident; strengthened transparency norms.

case_name: Parveen Rehman Murder: Reinvestigation Orders
summary: Ordered independent reinvestigation into a high-profile urban planning activist’s murder; stressed witness protection and impartiality.

case_name: Baldia Factory Fire (Ali Enterprises) — Accountability Proceedings
court: Anti-Terrorism Court, Karachi (follow-up oversight by SHC/SC)
summary: Convictions for arson/terrorism in a mass-casualty factory fire; courts underscored employer and state oversight duties.

case_name: Priyantha Kumara Lynching Case
court: Anti-Terrorism Court, Sialkot (supervisory jurisdiction of LHC)
summary: Swift trial and multiple convictions for a mob lynching; reinforced zero tolerance for vigilantism.

case_name: Bani Gala Regularization/Encroachments Case
summary: Directed a framework for regularization and environmental compliance against widespread encroachments in Islamabad’s zone.

case_name: Monal Restaurant / Margalla Hills National Park Case
summary: Protected the national park from commercial intrusion; invalidated leases inconsistent with conservation mandates.

case_name: Suo Motu: Oil Pricing & OGRA Transparency
summary: Examined petroleum pricing, supply shortages, and regulatory lapses; mandated transparent, cabinet-led decision-making.

case_name: Abdur Rehman Malik v. Federation (ECL Procedures)
summary: Read due process into the Exit Control List regimes and required notified reasons, timelines, and review.

case_name: Pakistan Broadcasters v. PEMRA (Licensing & Sanctions)
summary: Curbed arbitrary suspensions/fines; insisted on reasoned orders, proportionality, and fair hearing.

case_name: Pakistan Tobacco Company Ltd. v. Federation (Health Warnings)
summary: Balanced mandatory graphic health warnings with statutory authority; clarified limits of delegated legislation.

case_name: Suo Motu: K-Electric & Power Sector Load-Shedding
summary: Probed outages, tariffs, and distribution obligations; directed corrective measures and regulatory accountability.

case_name: Suo Motu: Pakistan Railways Corruption & Safety (Follow-up)
summary: Expanded earlier oversight with directions on safety audits, revenue leakages, and revival plans for the national carrier.

case_name: Khadija Siddiqi Stabbing Case
court: Supreme Court of Pakistan (leave granted; conviction restored)
summary: Restored conviction in a high-profile assault; emphasized survivor-centric adjudication and evidentiary appreciation.

case_name: Al-Rahim Traders v. Federation (Benami Transactions)
summary: Upheld regulatory powers against benami holdings with safeguards for due process and evidentiary standards.

case_name: Pakistan Medical & Dental Council Reconstitution Cases
summary: Settled competing statutory frameworks and transitional management of the medical regulator.

case_name: Pakistan Kidney & Liver Institute (PKLI) Management Case
summary: Reviewed governance and procurement of a flagship hospital; directed compliance with public sector rules.

case_name: Suo Motu: Safe Blood & Hospital Waste Disposal
summary: Ordered standards for blood banks and clinical waste; reinforced provincial duties post-18th Amendment.

case_name: Pakistan Airlines Pilots Association v. PIA
summary: Litigation around licensing, safety, and employment actions; balanced safety imperatives with labour protections.

case_name: Quetta Hazara Targeted Killings: Protection Orders
summary: Directed coordinated security measures to protect minorities; underscored state’s positive obligations under the right to life.

case_name: Taj Muhammad v. State (Honor Killings/Jirga)
summary: Outlawed jirga-sanctioned practices facilitating honor crimes; stressed prosecution of perpetrators and facilitators.

case_name: Pakistan Flour Mills Association v. Government (Price Controls)
summary: Reviewed statutory basis of wheat/flour controls; sought calibrated regulation respecting market dynamics and consumers’ rights.

case_name: Pakistan Petroleum Pricing: Cabinet Approval Mandate
summary: Applied cabinet-primacy doctrine to fiscal/regulatory decisions, aligning with constitutional allocation of executive power.

case_name: Kemu Hospital Trust v. Provincial Government
summary: Clarified governance of autonomous health institutions and limits on ad hoc governmental takeovers.

case_name: Jamshoro Power Company Procurement Case
summary: Enforced PPRA compliance and transparent tender evaluation in a large power project.

case_name: Pakistan Railways Freight Privilege Litigation
summary: Examined preferential contracts and leakages; directed rationalization and accountability in freight operations.

case_name: Air Marshal (R) Asghar Khan Case — Implementation (FIA Directions)
summary: Subsequent orders for investigation and prosecution arising from illegal political funding findings.

case_name: Suo Motu: Safe Drinking Water/Arsenic in Punjab
summary: Mandated action plans, budgeting, and technical oversight for potable water provision.

case_name: Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Local Government Elections Litigation
summary: Directed remedies for irregularities; emphasized independence of the polling process and dispute resolution.

case_name: Pakistan Telecommunication Authority v. Internet Service Providers
summary: Reviewed content takedown and blocking under PECA; required due process, notice, and reasoned decisions.

case_name: Missing Persons Commission/Enforced Disappearances — Follow-up Orders
summary: Strengthened tracing, reporting, and accountability mechanisms; periodic compliance monitoring ordered.

case_name: Suo Motu: Anti-Smoking & Public Spaces
summary: Directed strict enforcement of tobacco control laws in public places and around educational institutions.

case_name: Pakistan Steel Re-Rolling Mills v. Federation (Energy Pricing)
summary: Examined legality of surcharges and differential tariffs; required statutory basis and non-discrimination in energy pricing.
